ygData.subject: Bug - EmptyStackException when job is submitted via JMX
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there I am running Heritrix 1.12.1 and I have a very strange problem. When I submit a job via JMX (details to come) the seed URL causes an internal error,

Here are some more details:
* I s=
ubmit the job via JMX (using the addJob method) and giving it a 
JAR file c=
ontaining seeds.txt and order.xml.
* I tried submitting the same job using =
the WUI (without JMX) and it 
works fine.
* I ran diff on the order.xml fil=
es of the two jobs (the one 
submitted via JMX and the one created via the =
WUI) and they only 
differ in the name, description and date.
* I tried res=
tarting Heritrix but it did not help.

Any ideas? 
I really need to use JMX=

already, and the automated so=
lution uses JMX.

Thanks,
Joey
